channel.title: John Archer
channel.description: John Archer Congressional Candidate, 2d District of Iowa (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Greetings to the Iowa delegation and all the great people in the state of Iowa!
item.author: John Archer

item.title: Hope and change were elected four years ago, and where has that gotten us?
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We have more debt -- almost 16 trillion in debt. This White House believes in a tax and spend philosophy.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We have more doubt -- families don't know how much Obamacare will cost them, and businesses don't know what new regulations will burden them.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We have more despair -- for 42 months, unemployment has been above 8 percent. We keep waiting for it to improve -- and waiting and waiting and waiting.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We don't have to wait any more: We can do better! And we'll do it by talking honestly about the issues.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: As we have in Iowa this year, we will continue to talk about big ideas this week:
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We'll talk about a balanced budget -- we can do better.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We'll talk about tax relief for working families -- we can do better.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We'll talk about stopping the regulatory attack on farmers and small businesses -- we can do better.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: We'll talk about protecting Medicare and Social Security for this generation of seniors and the next -- we can do better.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: And we'll talk about getting government out from in-between patients and their doctors by repealing Obamacare -- we can do better.
item.author: John Archer

item.title: And we will do better in Iowa and across this great nation by electing Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan as the next President and Vice President of the United States this November!
item.author: John Archer

item.title: Thank you, and God bless Iowa and this great nation!
item.author: John Archer
